Title: Object: The Flight into Egypt
Description: At left, the Virgin Mary with the Christ Child on her lap sits by a tree; at right, Joseph crouching on the ground searching for wood to burn; in the background, the view of a town. 1899 Etching
Curator's comments: Opus no. 134a. Ill.p.335 in A member of the Royal Society of Painter - Etchers and Engravers, 'Charles Holroyd', The Magazine of Art, n.s. 1, 1902/3. Lent by Dodgson as no 36 to the 1927 Musee des Arts Decoratifs, Paris exhibition 'La gravure moderne anglaise' Information from Martin Hopkinson, January 2010
Acquisition notes: According to Dodgson's box file, purchased from the artist in November 1905 for £1.1.0
